content: this pattern uses slip_stitch ribbing for the cuff and single_crochet for the body that can be done waistcoat style pictured or traditional single_crochet if preferred though it will look super different i ve written it without the color changes to make it simpler and more versatile i have added a thumb opening option and have updated the thumb instructions with this here is a helpful post with instructions & also a video for the ribbing used on these mittens http //spindleshuttleneedlecrafts blogspot com/2016/01/slip-stitch-crochet-ribbing html
